Our top rated tours

Top rated and eco-friendly bike tours in town!

Adventure Tour - Mike

Adventure filled 2 hours long bike tour through out the city. Bring a pair of extra pants and towel with you.

Suburb Tour - Brian

This is a must for anyone that wants to see our hidden gems of endless beaches and wildlife. You will fall in love.

City Tour - George

City exploring tour, 2 hours long bike through out the city. You haven't seen our city until you've done this.

Nature Tour - Sam

If you love stones, birds and creepy caves, this the tour. We will ride inside one of the oldest man created caves.
